data.comment: The big names in today's match at Strandvallen have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Strandvallen.
In the minute 4, Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Armin Gigovic of Helsingborg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in high up the field for Mjallby in Hallevik.
In the minute 6, Mjallby's David Lofquist is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Throw-in for Helsingborg at Strandvallen.
In the minute 8, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Can Mjallby capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Helsingborg's half?
In the minute 10, Mjallby's Martin Spelmann misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Strandvallen.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Mjallby, close to Helsingborg's area.
Mjallby take a 1-0 lead thanks to Moses Ogbu.
Great play from Kadir Hodzic to set up the goal.
In the minute 13, Helsingborg drives forward and Rasmus Jonsson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Hallevik to check on Kebba Ceesay, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 16, Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Rasmus Jonsson of Helsingborg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Kebba Ceesay has recovered and rejoins the match in Hallevik.
Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
Mjallby advance rapidly upfield but Glenn Nyberg blows for offside.
In the minute 18, Helsingborg pushes forward through Alex Timossi Andersson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
Important block from the Mjallby defence as Armin Gigovic fires in a strike for Helsingborg.
In the minute 20, Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Kebba Ceesay (Helsingborg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Glenn Nyberg awards Mjallby a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Mjallby pushes forward through Jacob Bergstrom, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hallevik.
In the minute 26, Helsingborg's Armin Gigovic is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Mjallby.
David Lofquist (Mjallby) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 27, Mjallby have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team replace Alex Timossi Andersson with Alhaji Gero.
Throw-in Helsingborg.
In the minute 31, Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helsingborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Mjallby.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
In the minute 34, Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Helsingborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Helsingborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
In the minute 35, Brandur Hendriksson gets an equalizer for Helsingborg. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Adam Eriksson.
Throw-in Mjallby.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
Helsingborg push upfield but Glenn Nyberg quickly pulls them for offside.
Brandur Hendriksson of Helsingborg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 40, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
Throw-in for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
Glenn Nyberg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Mjallby surge into the attack at Strandvallen but Jacob Bergstrom’s header is off-target.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
Helsingborg's Brandur Hendriksson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mjallby defender.
In the minute 44, Helsingborg drives forward and Rasmus Jonsson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
Free kick for Helsingborg in the half of Mjallby.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Mjallby needs to be cautious. Helsingborg have an attacking throw-in.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Mjallby in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Hallevik.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Glenn Nyberg signals a Helsingborg throw-in in Mjallby's half.
Mjallby are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 49, Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Helsingborg have got their heads in front thanks to a Anthony van den Hurk strike.
In the minute 50, Kebba Ceesay with an assist there.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Brandur Hendriksson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 53, Helsingborg's Brandur Hendriksson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Eric Bjorkander for Mjallby gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Helsingborg at Strandvallen.
Throw-in Mjallby.
Mjallby to take a throw-in in Helsingborg territory.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Helsingborg in the half of Mjallby.
Andreas Landgren (Helsingborg) has replaced the possibly injured Brandur Hendriksson at Strandvallen.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Glenn Nyberg signals a Mjallby throw-in in Helsingborg's half.
Mjallby drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The home team have replaced Jacob Bergstrom with Mamudo Moro. This is the first substitution made today by Marcus Lantz.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Mjallby close to the penalty box.
Moses Ogbu of Mjallby smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
In the minute 64, Helsingborg to take a throw-in in Mjallby territory.
Free kick Helsingborg.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 66, Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Helsingborg, close to Mjallby's area.
In Hallevik, Joseph Ceesay of Helsingborg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
In the minute 67, Can Helsingborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Besard Sabovic is replacing Jonathan Tamimi for the home team.
Marcus Lantz (Mjallby) is making a third substitution, with Joel Nilsson replacing Martin Spelmann.
Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Glenn Nyberg awards Mjallby a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Glenn Nyberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Besard Sabovic grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Strandvallen.
Joel Nilsson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 73, Alhaji Gero gets his shot on target but fails to score for Helsingborg.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hallevik.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Mjallby close to the penalty box.
Mjallby are pushing forward but Mamudo Moro's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Strandvallen.
In the minute 76, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg.
David Lofquist is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Mjallby in the half of Helsingborg.
In the minute 80, Can Mjallby capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Helsingborg's half?
In Hallevik Mjallby drive forward through Joel Nilsson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
In the minute 83, David Lofquist (Mjallby) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Hallevik Mjallby attack through Mamudo Moro. The finish is off target, however.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Helsingborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
Max Svensson is on a sub for Rasmus Jonsson for Helsingborg.
In the minute 85, Helsingborg make their fourth substitution with Mohammed Abubakari replacing Anthony van den Hurk.
Free kick for Helsingborg in the half of Mjallby.
Jesper Lofgren for Mjallby has been booked by Glenn Nyberg and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 87, Max Svensson (Helsingborg) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Helsingborg are coming forward and Martin Olsson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
In the minute 88, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Mjallby.
Throw-in for Helsingborg at Strandvallen.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hallevik.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Free kick Mjallby.
Full-time! The final score is 3-2.
Goal! A David Lofquist header gives Mjallby a 3-2 lead in Hallevik.
Mamudo Moro with an assist there.
Mix Diskerud (Helsingborg) gets a yellow card.
